title: Episode 191: Mindful Ambition with Zuri Hall
itunes:title: Episode 191: Mindful Ambition with Zuri Hall
itunes:subtitle: Doree becomes an ace tennis player and Kate grieves for a discontinued product. Then, Zuri Hall (Access Hollywood correspondent and host of iHeart Radio and Black Effect Network's Hot Happy Mess podcast) joins Forever35 to talk about how she learn...
description:
Doree becomes an ace tennis player and Kate grieves for a discontinued product. Then, Zuri Hall (Access Hollywood correspondent and host of iHeart Radio and Black Effect Network's Hot Happy Mess podcast) joins Forever35 to talk about how she learned the importance of balance, how she only recently stopped going to bed with a full face of TV makeup every night, and why she thinks speaking your intention is so powerful. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
